title: Two measures of government expenditure as a share of GDP
subtitle: This chart shows the relationship between central government expenditure as a share of GDP (WDI data using IMF estimates) and total government expenditure, also as share of GDP (Mauro et al 2015 using IMF estimates).
sourceDesc: IMF Fiscal Affairs Departmental Data, based on Mauro et al. (2015); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
